Rowdy Wolf:









Rowdy Wolf said, "Oh no, it wouldn't be any trouble." He looked back at the 
herd. "It wouldn't be a waste. There never should." He squinted. "I do have 
a cave. I have food there." He looked at her. "Would that be better? Or 
not?" He stood up straight.
